title: BioNexus Gene Lab Corp. Completes Strategic Investment in Fidelion Diagnostics; Secures 15% Equity Stake in Global AI-Oncology Platform and Exclusive Southeast Asian Rights for VitaGuard™
description: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- BioNexus Gene Lab Corp. (NASDAQ: BGLC) ("BGLC" or the "Company"), a biotechnology company advancing precision diagnostics and gene-based technologies, today announced the formal completion of its strat…
